MemberSignature.Value: public Java.Sql.IResultSet GetAttributes (string catalog, string schemaPattern, string typeNamePattern, string attributeNamePattern);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Sql.IResultSet GetAttributes(string catalog, string schemaPattern, string typeNamePattern, string attributeNamePattern) cil managed

Docs.param: a catalog name. null is used to imply no narrowing of the search by catalog name. Otherwise, the name must match a catalog name held in the database, with "" used to retrieve those without a catalog name.

a schema name pattern. null is used to imply no narrowing of the search by a schema name. Otherwise, the name must match a schema name in the database, with "" used to retrieve those without a schema name.
a type name. This pattern must match the type name stored in the database.
an Attribute name. This pattern must match the attribute name as stored in the database.
Docs.summary: Returns a ResultSet describing a subset of the attributes of a specified SQL User Defined Type (UDT) for a specified schema and catalog.
Docs.exception: if there is a database error.

MemberSignature.Value: public Java.Sql.IResultSet GetBestRowIdentifier (string catalog, string schema, string table, int scope, bool nullable);

Docs.param: a catalog name. null is used to imply no narrowing of the search by catalog name. Otherwise, the name must match a catalog name held in the database, with "" used to retrieve those without a catalog name.

a schema name pattern. null is used to imply no narrowing of the search by schema name. Otherwise, the name must match a schema name in the database, with "" used to retrieve those without a schema name.
the table name. This must match the name of the table as declared in the database.
the SCOPE of interest, values as defined above.
true = include columns that are nullable, false = do not include nullable columns.
Docs.summary: Returns a list of a table's optimal set of columns that uniquely identify the rows.
Docs.exception: if there is a database error.

MemberSignature.Value: public Java.Sql.IResultSet GetCrossReference (string primaryCatalog, string primarySchema, string primaryTable, string foreignCatalog, string foreignSchema, string foreignTable);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Sql.IResultSet GetCrossReference(string primaryCatalog, string primarySchema, string primaryTable, string foreignCatalog, string foreignSchema, string foreignTable) cil managed

Docs.param: a catalog name for the primary key table. null is used to imply no narrowing of the search by catalog name. Otherwise, the name must match a catalog name held in the database, with "" used to retrieve those without a catalog name.

a schema name for the primary key table. null is used to imply no narrowing of the search by schema name. Otherwise, the name must match a schema name in the database, with "" used to retrieve those without a schema name.
the name of the table which exports the key. It must match the name of the table in the database.

a catalog name for the foreign key table. null is used to imply no narrowing of the search by catalog name. Otherwise, the name must match a catalog name held in the database, with "" used to retrieve those without a catalog name.

a schema name for the foreign key table. null is used to imply no narrowing of the search by schema name. Otherwise, the name must match a schema name in the database, with "" used to retrieve those without a schema name.
the name of the table importing the key. It must match the name of the table in the database.
Docs.summary: Returns a list of foreign key columns in a given foreign key table that reference the primary key columns of a supplied primary key table.
Docs.exception: if there is a database error.

a schema name. null is used to imply no narrowing of the search by schema name. Otherwise, the name must match a schema name in the database, with "" used to retrieve those without a schema name.
a table name, which must match the name of a table in the database
Docs.summary: Returns a list of the foreign key columns that reference the primary key columns of a specified table (the foreign keys exported by a table).

Docs.param: a catalog name. null is used to imply no narrowing of the search by catalog name. Otherwise, the name must match a catalog name held in the database, with "" used to retrieve those without a catalog name.
a schema name. null is used to imply no narrowing of the search by schema name. Otherwise, the name must match a schema name in the database, with "" used to retrieve those without a schema name.
a table name, which must match the name of a table in the database.

true implies that the list can contain approximate or "out of data" values, false implies that all values must be precisely accurate

Docs.param: a catalog name. null is used to imply no narrowing of the search by catalog name. Otherwise, the name must match a catalog name held in the database, with "" used to retrieve those without a catalog name.

Docs.param: the Type to convert from, as defined by java.sql.Types
the Type to convert to, as defined by java.sql.Types

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool SupportsDifferentTableCorrelationNames() cil managed

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool SupportsFullOuterJoins() cil managed

Docs.summary: Determines whether the database supports full nested outer joins.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool SupportsGetGeneratedKeys() cil managed

Docs.summary: Determines whether auto generated keys can be returned when a statement executes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool SupportsGroupBy() cil managed

Docs.summary: Determines whether the database supports GROUP BY clauses.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool SupportsGroupByBeyondSelect() cil managed

Docs.summary: Determines whether the database supports using a column name in a GROUP BY clause not included in the SELECT statement as long as all of the columns in the SELECT statement are used in the GROUP BY clause.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool SupportsGroupByUnrelated() cil managed

Docs.summary: Determines whether the database supports using a column name in a GROUP BY clause that is not in the SELECT statement.

Docs.summary: Determines whether the database supports Minimum SQL Grammar for ODBC.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool SupportsMixedCaseIdentifiers() cil managed

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool SupportsMixedCaseQuotedIdentifiers() cil managed

Docs.summary: Determines whether retrieving multiple ResultSets from a single call to the execute method is supported.

Docs.summary: Determines whether multiple simultaneous transactions on different connections are supported.

Docs.summary: Determines whether callable statements with named parameters is supported.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool SupportsNonNullableColumns() cil managed

Docs.summary: Determines whether columns in the database can be defined as non-nullable.

Docs.summary: Determines whether keeping cursors open across commit operations is supported.

Docs.summary: Determines whether the database can keep cursors open across rollback operations.

Docs.summary: Determines whether keeping statements open across rollback operations is supported.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool SupportsOrderByUnrelated() cil managed

Docs.summary: Determines whether using a column in an ORDER BY clause that is not in the SELECT statement is supported.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool SupportsOuterJoins() cil managed

Docs.summary: Determines whether outer join operations are supported.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool SupportsPositionedDelete() cil managed

Docs.summary: Determines whether positioned DELETE statements are supported.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool SupportsResultSetConcurrency (int type, int concurrency);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool SupportsResultSetConcurrency(int32 type, int32 concurrency) cil managed

Docs.param:
the ResultSet type, as defined in java.sql.ResultSet:
ResultSet.TYPE_FORWARD_ONLY
ResultSet.TYPE_SCROLL_INSENSITIVE
ResultSet.TYPE_SCROLL_SENSITIVE
a concurrency type, which may be one of ResultSet.CONCUR_READ_ONLY or ResultSet.CONCUR_UPDATABLE.
Docs.summary: Determines whether there is support for a given concurrency style for the given ResultSet.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool SupportsResultSetHoldability(int32 holdability) cil managed

Docs.param: as specified in java.sql.ResultSet: ResultSet.HOLD_CURSORS_OVER_COMMIT or ResultSet.CLOSE_CURSORS_AT_COMMIT
Docs.summary: Determines whether the supplied ResultSet holdability mode is supported.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool SupportsResultSetType(int32 type) cil managed

Docs.summary: Determines whether the supplied ResultSet type is supported.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: Android.Runtime.Register("getTableTypes", "()Ljava/sql/ResultSet;", "GetGetTableTypesHandler:Java.Sql.IDatabaseMetaDataInvoker, Mono.Android, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null")
